articles.title: Coronavirus US: Millions defy travel warnings to fly for Christmas - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Coronavirus US: Millions defy travel warnings to fly for Christmas
articles.content: Travel warnings are falling on millions of deaf ears in the United States as domestic flyers took to the skies in large numbers over the weekend, despite an alarming surge in COVID-19 cases.More than… [+2332 chars]
